column4: I'm looking for help with fakeraid (BIOS RAID) 10 setup. In Ubiquity it's showing 2x RAID0 instead of one RAID10
you have to use the Alternate CD for RAID
I'm pretty sire I am, as it said SATA RAID detected at the "Detect disks" stage. But at the "Partition Disks" stage it's showing two RAID 0s instead of one RAID 10.
